Your Life at
Barley Snyder

With nearly 100 attorneys and nine offices across central Pennsylvania and northern Maryland, we are the one of the largest full-service firms in the region. We distinguish ourselves by focusing on excellent client service, a true commitment to our communities and a reputation for results.

Learn More

Summer Associate Program

The program is designed to help the summer associate learn about life within the firm and would also allow the opportunity to accompany our attorneys to depositions, client meetings and court appearances. The nearly 100 lawyers at the firm are encouraged to participate in the program, giving aspiring attorneys the opportunity to work with one of the most diverse and experienced staff of attorneys in all of central Pennsylvania.

Learn More
